15 class GeneratorMockup : public Generator
16 {
17  PlanningScenePtr ps;
18  InterfacePtr prev;
19  InterfacePtr next;
20 
21 public:
22  GeneratorMockup() : Generator("generator") {
23  prev.reset(new Interface);
24  next.reset(new Interface);
25  pimpl()->setPrevEnds(prev);
26  pimpl()->setNextStarts(next);
27  }
28 
29  void init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) override {
30  ps.reset((new PlanningScene(robot_model)));
31  }
32 
33  bool canCompute() const override { return true; }
34  void compute() override {
35  InterfaceState state(ps);
36  state.properties().set("target_pose", geometry_msgs::PoseStamped());
37  spawn(std::move(state), 0.0);
38  }
39 };

42 {
43 public:
44  using Connecting::compatible;
45  void compute(const InterfaceState& from, const InterfaceState& to) override {}
46 };

48 TEST(Stage, registerCallbacks) {
49  ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_ROOT_LOGGER_NAME, ros::console::levels::Fatal);
50 
51  GeneratorMockup g;
52  g.init(getModel());
53 
54  uint called = 0;
55  auto cb = [&called](const SolutionBase& s) {
56  ++called;
57  return true;
58  };
59 
60  auto it = g.addSolutionCallback(cb);
61  g.compute();
62  EXPECT_EQ(called, 1u);
63 
64  g.removeSolutionCallback(it);
65  g.compute();
66  EXPECT_EQ(called, 1u);
67 }

69 TEST(ComputeIK, init) {
70  ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_ROOT_LOGGER_NAME, ros::console::levels::Fatal);
71 
72  auto g = std::make_unique<GeneratorMockup>();
73  stages::ComputeIK ik("ik", std::move(g));
74  moveit::core::RobotModelPtr robot_model = getModel();
75  auto& props = ik.properties();
76 
77  // neither eef nor group defined should not throw
78  EXPECT_NO_THROW(ik.init(robot_model));
79 
80  // invalid eef should throw
81  props.set("eef", std::string("undefined"));
82  EXPECT_THROW(ik.init(robot_model), InitStageException);
83 
84  // valid eef should not throw
85  props.set("eef", std::string("eef"));
86  EXPECT_NO_THROW(ik.init(robot_model));
87 
88  props.set("eef", boost::any());
89 
90  // invalid group should throw
91  props.set("group", std::string("undefined"));
92  EXPECT_THROW(ik.init(robot_model), InitStageException);
93 
94  // valid group should not throw
95  props.set("group", std::string("base_from_base_to_tip"));
96  EXPECT_NO_THROW(ik.init(robot_model));
97 }
98 
99 TEST(ModifyPlanningScene, allowCollisions) {
100  ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_ROOT_LOGGER_NAME, ros::console::levels::Fatal);
101 
102  auto s = std::make_unique<stages::ModifyPlanningScene>();
103  std::string first = "foo", second = "boom";
104  s->allowCollisions(first, second, true);
105  s->allowCollisions(first, std::vector<const char*>{ "ab", "abc" }, false);
106 
107  s->allowCollisions("foo", std::vector<const char*>{ "bar", "boom" }, true);
108  s->allowCollisions("foo", std::set<const char*>{ "ab", "abc" }, false);
109 }
110 
111 void spawnObject(PlanningScene& scene, const std::string& name, int type,
112  const std::vector<double>& pos = { 0, 0, 0 }) {
113  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject o;
114  o.id = name;
115  o.header.frame_id = scene.getPlanningFrame();
116  o.primitive_poses.resize(1);
117  o.primitive_poses[0].position.x = pos[0];
118  o.primitive_poses[0].position.y = pos[1];
119  o.primitive_poses[0].position.z = pos[2];
120  o.primitive_poses[0].orientation.w = 1.0;
121 
122  o.primitives.resize(1);
123  o.primitives[0].type = type;
124 
125  switch (type) {
126  case shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::CYLINDER:
127  o.primitives[0].dimensions = { 0.1, 0.02 };
128  break;
129  case shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::BOX:
130  o.primitives[0].dimensions = { 0.1, 0.2, 0.3 };
131  break;
132  case shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::SPHERE:
133  o.primitives[0].dimensions = { 0.05 };
134  break;
135  }
136  scene.processCollisionObjectMsg(o);
137 }
138 
139 void attachObject(PlanningScene& scene, const std::string& object, const std::string& link, bool attach) {
140  moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject obj;
141  obj.link_name = link;
142  obj.object.operation =
143  attach ? (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD : (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
144  obj.object.id = object;
145  scene.processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(obj);
146 }
147 
148 TEST(Connect, compatible) {
149  ConnectMockup connect;
150  auto scene = std::make_shared<PlanningScene>(getModel());
151  auto& state = scene->getCurrentStateNonConst();
152  state.setToDefaultValues();
153  spawnObject(*scene, "object", shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::CYLINDER);
154  state.update();
155 
156  auto other = scene->diff();
157  EXPECT_TRUE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "identical scenes";
158 
159  spawnObject(*other, "object", shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::BOX);
160  // EXPECT_FALSE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "different shapes";
161 
162  spawnObject(*other, "object", shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::CYLINDER, { 0.1, 0, 0 });
163  EXPECT_FALSE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "different pose";
164 
165  spawnObject(*other, "object", shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::CYLINDER);
166  EXPECT_TRUE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "same objects";
167 
168  // attached objects
169  other = scene->diff();
170  attachObject(*scene, "object", "base_link", true);
171  EXPECT_FALSE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "detached and attached object";
172 
173  other = scene->diff();
174  EXPECT_TRUE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "identical scenes, attached object";
175 
176  spawnObject(*other, "object", shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::CYLINDER, { 0.1, 0, 0 });
177  attachObject(*other, "object", "base_link", true);
178  EXPECT_FALSE(connect.compatible(scene, other)) << "different pose";
179 }
